sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CS_ID ,A.CS_NM ,A.POST ,A.ADDRESS ,A.TEL ,A.LAT ,A.LON ,A.MANAGER ,A.USE_YN ,(SELECT SUM(IF(B.STS=2, 1, 0)) FROM CHARGER B WHERE 1=1 AND B.CS_ID = A.CS_ID) CHARGING ,A.CREATED_AT ,A.CREATED_BY ,A.UPDATED_AT ,A.UPDATED_BY FROM STATION_INFO A WHERE 1=1
SELECT CHARGER_GRP_ID as chargerGrpId ,CHARGER_ID as chargerId ,CTP as ctp ,STS as sts FROM CHARGER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CS_ID = #id#

SELECT SID, CID, CNM, PMR, PMD, CTP, COT, MDN, EIP, EPT, VIP, VPT, MMR, RMR, STRM, RTRM, CTRM, VTRM, VER, STS, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_BY
FROM CHARGER A WHERE 1=1 AND SID = #searchKeyword#
ORDER BY CID
